segments.text: Welcome , Li Mei . Please give me your coat and hat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , let's come in and enjoy yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Happy birthday , Peter , and many happy returns of the day . Here's a present for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Li Mei . Come into the dining room . I'm going to cut the cake soon .
segments.speaker: S1
